duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct financial and regulatory reporting and data analysis.
Provide daily support on small and/or moderately complex issues, accounts, and projects for assigned systems, products, or business units.
Identify potential improvements to current procedures, plans, and controls to achieve financial objectives.
Generate data analytics, treasury reports or other technical documentation as needed.
Produce reports based on data analysis, company trends, and financial processes.
Assist with other internal reporting projects as directed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree and 1 years of experience in Finance or Analytics OR High School Diploma or GED and 5 years of experience in Finance or Analytics
